hooks.command: osascript -e 'display notification "Claude needs your attention" with title "Claude Code"' && printf '\a'

file=$(cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.file // ""'); has_proj() { d="$PWD"; while [[ "$d" != "/" ]]; do [[ -f "$d/pyproject.toml" ]] && return 0; d=$(dirname "$d"); done; return 1; }; [[ "$file" == *.py ]] && { if has_proj; then uv run ruff format "$file" && uv run ruff check --fix "$file"; else uvx ruff format "$file" && uvx ruff check --fix "$file"; fi; }; true
